snippet: Anthony Bonomo testified that he was afraid to fire Adam Skelos, 33, from his $78,000-a-year job because it might upset his father, who at the time was the State Senate majority leader.
abstract: Physicians' Reciprocal Insurers chief executive Anthony Bonomo testifies in federal corruption trial of New York State Sen Dean G Skelos and his son Adam about employing Adam and his fears of firing him; Bonomo details how company skipped undertaking performance review of Adam due to influence his father had over legislation that would affect PRI's business.
lead_paragraph: Anthony Bonomo testified that he was afraid to fire Adam Skelos, 33, from his $78,000-a-year job because it might upset his father, who at the time was the State Senate majority leader.

headline.main: Testimony at Trial Details No-Show Job of Dean Skelos’s Son
headline.print_headline: Testimony at Trial Details No-Show Job of Senator’s Son
